Html:
Hi,

I'd like to use DataGrid in a project I'm working on. Where can I find the documentation on the control?

Right now I need to query for the selected row, but that's surely not the last thing I'll need. I wonder
if documentation exist at all - all I've found is a bunch of samples, which is not enough.

Hi jangjang,

Official MSDN documentation will be available when DataGrid is rolled back into the platform in .NET 4.0.  In the meantime, I recommend that you search the Discussion forums on this site and post any questions which you can't find an answer to.  There are also a lot of blogs with great information, and we've got some samples (which you may already have seen) to help you with the basics: http://wpf.codeplex.com/Wiki/View.aspx?title=Links%20to%20Documentation.

Thanks,
Samantha
